thread.title: Confucius Institute to Host the Chinese Culture and Art Show Featuring Jiangsu Normal University Performing Troupe, Sept. 25-26Travelandtourworld.com
thread.title_full: Confucius Institute to Host the Chinese Culture and Art Show Featuring Jiangsu Normal University Performing Troupe, Sept. 25-26Travelandtourworld.com

author: travelandtourworld.com
title: Confucius Institute to Host the Chinese Culture and Art Show Featuring Jiangsu Normal University Performing Troupe, Sept. 25-26Travelandtourworld.com
text:
Confucius Institute to Host the Chinese Culture and Art Show Featuring Jiangsu Normal University Performing Troupe, Sept. 25-26 Published on : Friday, September 18, 2015
To celebrate Harvest Moon Festival and global Confucius Institute Day, the Confucius Institute at Miami Dade College (MDC) will host the Chinese Culture and Art Show featuring Jiangsu Normal University Performing Troupe at Wolfson Campus Friday, Sept. 25 and Saturday Sept. 26. The events are free and open to the public.
The 14-member Jiangsu Normal University Performing Troupe will present Chinese musical, vocal, martial arts and Tai Chi performances with a focus on “Han Culture”, one of the most distinguished ethnic cultures developed in the past 2,000 years. Some of the most famous and classical stories and legends about love, friendship, war and peace in the Chinese history will be illustrated and reflected in this stage performance.
Supported by Student Life at MDC Wolfson and Kendall campuses, these events are co-sponsored by the Chinese Association of Science, Education and Culture of South Florida (CASEC). To join the annual celebration of Harvest Moon Festival at MDC, four leading groups of Chinese artists from Palm Beach, Broward and Miami-Dade counties will participate in the second performance at Kendall Campus on Sept. 26.
As MDC’s partner university in China, Jiangsu Normal University has been supporting the Confucius Institute at MDC with various educational and cultural exchange programs since 2010. This is the second time that Jiangsu Normal University sends its performing troupe to Miami Dade College, after the first visit in 2011.
